name: ðŸ”¥ Fire Bingo
description:
Let's ring in the New Year with a bang! Win your share of $2 MILLION by having 5 fire/ash in a row!

Guide
  • Tune into the #special-event to listen to our fire music playlist!
  • Claim a fire bingo room by standing inside on the 3rd floor.
  • Once told to begin, simply launch rockets in your room!!!
  • The first 3 to shout "BINGO" and have 5 fires/ash piles in a row, WIN!!!
Tips
  • TURN OFF GRAPHIC SETTINGS [For both 2D/3D to not lag] (Under "OPTIONS > GRAPHIC OPTIONS")
    • Advanced Lighting (Drag slider all the way to the left to turn off)
      • Directional Lighting (Uncheck)
      • Complex Shaders (Uncheck)
      • Details (Set all to "Low")
    • The middle square is FREE and can be included in your row!
